ygData.subject: Re: Hail, fellow EQ addicts!
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoa, Jasmy, no freaking way! I can t believe you re here. Too cool. Haven t seen you in a while - my EQ time is erratic, what with college getting in the way
ygData.messageBody:
Whoa, Jasmy, no freaking way! I can't believe
you're here. Too cool. Haven't seen you in a while - my
EQ time is erratic, what with college getting in the
way :). I just got to lv 12 tonight, hunted the gnoll
commander/elite gnoll room in BB with some capable if not greedy
friends. I got some rad equipment - I'm in full banded
now. Also, this one really cool necromancer, Gixon,
who's probably at lv 50 by now, hooked me up. He gave
me a fine steel two-handed sword, which I'm using
now. He also gave me a bronze helm and a Qeynos kite
shield and gave me about 100 pp, all for just some bone
chips. He is too cool. Anyway, long time no see -
perhaps we shall run into each other
again!<br><br>Iskandar<br>Half-elf warrior of 12 seasons<br>Prexus
